description.en: DEFY is the utility token of DEFY, a play-to-earn NFT Blockchain mobile game. DEFY immerses players in a metaverse that bridges the virtual and physical worlds, fusing hyper casual code breaking gameplay, learn-to-earn elements and real world exploration with AR adventures.
